Ri Hoe Chang's "Apology" Too Late
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Angola 
    Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "Abuses of Socialism Are Intolerable" was brought out in booklet by the National Publishing House of Angola on Dec. 12.
 The work, published on March 1, Juche 82 (1993), discloses the reactionary and nonsensical nature of the sophism let loose by imperialists and renegades of socialism who slandered socialism as "totalitarian", "barracks-like" and "administrative and commanding" one.    
 It clarifies principled issues arising in defending and accomplishing the socialist cause including the issue of having an unshakable faith in socialism and regarding it as a moral duty to defend it and the issue of giving fullest play to the advantages of socialism.

articles.content:
Credentials from Peruvian Ambassador
    Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Jorge Bayona Medina, Peruvian ambassador e. p. to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
 After receiving credentials the president conversed with the ambassador.
